entry.title: https://github.com/ChristianLempa/boilerplates
entry.content: This is my personal template collection. Here you'll find templates, and configurations for various tools, and technologies.

entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-elasticache-memcached
entry.content: Terraform Module for ElastiCache Memcached Cluster

entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-cloudtrail-cloudwatch-alarms
entry.content: Terraform module for creating alarms for tracking important changes and occurrences from cloudtrail.

entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-codebuild
entry.content: Terraform Module to easily leverage AWS CodeBuild for Continuous Integration

entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-elastic-beanstalk-environment
entry.content: Terraform module to provision an AWS Elastic Beanstalk Environment

entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-cloudtrail-s3-bucket
entry.content: S3 bucket with built in IAM policy to allow CloudTrail logs

entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-sso
entry.content: Terraform module to configure AWS Single Sign-On (SSO)

entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-config
entry.content: This module configures AWS Config, a service that enables you to assess, audit, and evaluate the configurations of your AWS resources.

entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-msk-apache-kafka-cluster
entry.content: Terraform module to provision AWS MSK

entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-ec2-instance
entry.content: Terraform module for provisioning a general purpose EC2 host

entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-vpc-peering
entry.content: Terraform module to create a peering connection between two VPCs in the same AWS account.

entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-elasticache-redis
entry.content: Terraform module to provision an ElastiCache Redis Cluster

entry.title: https://github.com/gruntwork-io/terragrunt-infrastructure-modules-example
entry.content: A repo used to show examples file/folder structures you can use with Terragrunt and Terraform

entry.title: https://github.com/hashicorp/terraform-aws-consul
entry.content: A Terraform Module for how to run Consul on AWS using Terraform and Packer

entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-alb
entry.content: Terraform module to provision a standard ALB for HTTP/HTTP traffic

entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-dynamic-subnets
entry.content: Terraform module for public and private subnets provisioning in existing VPC

entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-efs
entry.content: Terraform Module to define an EFS Filesystem (aka NFS)
